org.rcsb.mbt.controllers.scene
Class SceneController

java.lang.Object
  org.rcsb.mbt.controllers.scene.SceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUpdateListener, GvPickEventListener
public class SceneController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GvPickEventListener, IUpdateListener

Controls everything related to the 3d scene. The exception is the glviewer, which is contained by the active frame, since the viewer is parented by that. May move that over here, too, though.

Author:
rickb
See Also:
org.rcsb.ui.mainframe.DocumentFrameBase
